title: A lower bound for the volatility swap in the lognormal SABR model. (arXiv:2306.14602v1 [q-fin.MF])
abstract: In the short time to maturity limit it is proved that for the conditionally lognormal SABR model the zero vanna implied volatility is a lower bound for the volatility swap strike. The result is valid for all values of the correlation parameter and is a sharper lower bound than the at-the-money implied volatility for correlation less than or equal to zero.
context:
Title: A lower bound for the volatility swap in the lognormal SABR model. (arXiv:2306.14602v1 [q-fin.MF])
Abstract: In the short time to maturity limit it is proved that for the conditionally lognormal SABR model the zero vanna implied volatility is a lower bound for the volatility swap strike. The result is valid for all values of the correlation parameter and is a sharper lower bound than the at-the-money implied volatility for correlation less than or equal to zero.
translated_title: 一种对数正态SABR模型波动率互换的下界
translated_abstract: 本研究证明，在短期到期的限制条件下，对于条件性对数正态的SABR模型，零散度隐含波动率是波动率互换行权价的下界。对于所有相关参数，该结果都是有效的，并且在相关性小于或等于零时比平值隐含波动率更为精确。
tldr: 本研究对于条件性对数正态的SABR模型，证明了零散度隐含波动率是波动率互换行权价的下界，该结论适用于所有相关参数，并且在相关性小于或等于零时比平值隐含波动率更为精确。
en_tdlr: This study proves that for the conditionally lognormal SABR model, the zero vanna implied volatility is a lower bound for the volatility swap strike in the short time to maturity limit. The result holds for all values of the correlation parameter and is a sharper lower bound than the at-the-money implied volatility for correlation less than or equal to zero.
